tasks.label: Start Development Servers
args: Write-Host 'Starting both client and server...'; Start-Job -ScriptBlock { Set-Location 'D:\web-dev\collage-project\byte-sized-banishment\server'; npm run dev } -Name 'ServerJob'; Start-Job -ScriptBlock { Set-Location 'D:\web-dev\collage-project\byte-sized-banishment\client'; npm run dev } -Name 'ClientJob'; Write-Host 'Both servers starting in background...'; Write-Host 'Server will be available at http://localhost:5000'; Write-Host 'Client will be available at http://localhost:5173'; Write-Host 'Use Get-Job to check status'; Receive-Job -Name 'ServerJob', 'ClientJob' -Wait
